timeline.body:
Please don't use hardcoded localhost. If we would need to run the tests e.g. with a different host (and we do need that now in some cases to properly test cookies) or without SSL, this won't work.

Something like:
```suggestion
        assertClientRep(apps.get("account-console"), "Account Console", false, true, getAuthServerRoot() + "/realms/test/account/", false);
```

This concerns other lines as well.

Please don't use hardcoded localhost. If we would need to run the tests e.g. with a different host (and we do need that now in some cases to properly test cookies) or without SSL, this won't work.

Something like:

Suggested change
assertClientRep(apps.get("account-console"), "Account Console", false, true, "https://localhost:8543/auth/realms/test/account/", false);
assertClientRep(apps.get("account-console"), "Account Console", false, true, getAuthServerRoot() + "/realms/test/account/", false);

This concerns other lines as well.
